mention_address: "Glendale Galleria, 100, Galleria Way, Glendale, Los Angeles County, California, 91203, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: Teens wanted to spend so much time here, great quality food court, lots of variety in shops. The Sweet Shop alone took us 30 mins to explore.
